What is Pretty Links?
Pretty Links is a charming bookmarks extension designed to make managing your bookmarks as cute as can be! With a soft strawberry pink theme and customizable folder icons, it turns your browser into an adorable hub for all your favorite links.

What Can Pretty Links Do?

Customizable Folders: Personalize your folders with icons like bows, hearts, and stars for a unique, stylish look.
Right-Click to Save: Quickly bookmark any webpage by right-clicking and adding it to your Pretty Links collection.
Navigate Between Folders: Move seamlessly between folders to keep your bookmarks organized and easy to find.
Simple & Fun to Use: Managing bookmarks has never been this enjoyable or visually delightful!
